HFX Alerts: The Last Update
This update marks the end of HFX's 5 year journey.
With nearly 300 active users and 150 reviews, thank you for supporting HFX! :)
Unfortunately, Omni closed and deleted all of my content off the site, so I will not be returning.
To read more about the future of HFX, check out my old profile (requires v2.7.0).

much <3, xadamxk
